about_the_game:
Become a mage and fight the corrupted monsters threatening the peace of Osmea. Invent your own spells ranging from multi-stage projectiles to area effects or healing and speed buffing spells.
Invite your friends to help you in battle against waves of monsters and powerful enemies. Tinker around and finetune your arsenal of spells and level up your attributes until you are strong enough to challenge the 3 bosses who are at the root of the corruption.

Spell Creation


Use a powerful editor to create new spells and customize every aspect. Design projectiles that follow enemies or heal friends. They can even trigger more projectiles in multiple stages or end in an area of effect. Tune self targetting spells to heal yourself or give you a speed boost.

Specialization


Specialize your playstyle with skills such as adding chaining damage that jumps to nearby enemies, make area effects move with you, or add healing over time to your healing projectiles.

short_description: Mages of Osmea is a top down spellslinging RPG where you create your own spells to defeat corrupted monsters. Fight through waves of monsters and bosses, completing objectives in singleplayer or with friends.
